# Over view

This is a data base for XRF chemstry Data set.

# Data sets

## Elements

```{r}
elements <-
  c("Al", "Si", "S", "Mn", "Fe", "Co", "Ni", "Cu", "Zn", "As", "Ag", "Sn", "Sb", "Au", "Pb", "Bi")
```


## Data set

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(readr)

data_set <- read_csv("el-ahwat_chem.csv")

```


## Celaning data data

```{r}
data_set_clean <- 
  data_set %>% select(!contains("Error")) %>%  # Removes the Errores
  select(Lab_ID, starts_with(elements)) %>% # Removes all Other elements
  select(!`Collimation Status`)
```

## Createding List of Mean and Standard Diviation

```{r}
data_overview <- 
  data_set_clean %>%
  group_by(Lab_ID) %>% 
  summarise(across(everything(), list(mean = mean, sd = sd)))
```

## Isolating Items which conatina high Standar Diviation

```{r}

high_sd <- 
  function(x){
  x >= 3
  }

data_isolated <-
  data_overview %>% 
  filter(if_any(ends_with("sd"), high_sd))
```
